name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2 5G
Dimensions: Unfolded: 159.2 x 128.2 x 6.9 mm, Folded: 159.2 x 68 x 13.8 - 16.8 mm
Build: Glass front (folded), plastic front (unfolded), glass back, aluminum frame
OS: Android 10, upgradable to Android 11, One UI 3.1
CPU: Octa-core (1x3.09 GHz Kryo 585 & 3x2.42 GHz Kryo 585 & 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 585)
Triple: 12 MP, f/1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/1.76”, 1.8µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 12 MP,f / 2.4,52 mm(telephoto), 1 / 3.6”, 1.0 µm, PDAF, OIS, 2 x optical zoom 12 MP, f / 2.2, 123˚, 12 mm(ultrawide),    1.12 µm
Single: 10 MP, f/2.2, 26mm (wide), 1/3”, 1.22µm, Cover camera: 10 MP, f/2.2, 26mm (wide), 1/3”, 1.22µm
WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS
Sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer Bixby natural language commands and dictation, Samsung DeX(desktop experience support), Samsung Pay(Visa,MasterCard certified), Ultra Wideband(UWB) support
Charging: Fast charging 25W, Fast wireless charging 11 W, Reverse wireless charging 4.5 W
Colors: Mystic Bronze, Mystic Black, Thom Browne Edition, Aston Martin Racing Edition
